comment.author: 33497395@N08
comment._content: Hawker Tempest III prototype LA610, Rolls-Royce Griffon II B engine.

comment.author: 93253874@N07
comment._content: Wrong. This aircraft is fitted with a Napier Sabre VII. At this time, it was called the Hawker Fury. The name was changed from Tempest III, to Fury, shortly after the aircraft's first flight. At the time of the first flight, it was equipped with a Rolls Royce Griffon, with contra-rotating propellor, and looked very different: www.vicflintham.co.uk/content/post-war-military-aircraft/...

comment.author: 93253874@N07
